attributes.action: Withdraw our forces from Afghanistan to a set date and timetable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The'Democracy' now installed in Afghanistan, is, whilst a travesty in the normal sense,as good as it is going to get in light of the effort the Afghan people are prepared to put in to voting and or engaging in the political process. Any future democratic progress is down to themselves alone. Our Forces have done all that can be done, and no more lives should be wasted trying to force the issue further. Their mission and reason to be there is now complete. Let UN forces now take up reconstruction duties.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
